channel.title: Adding multi wild section

item.title: Adding multi wild section
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Well ive been working on a new pk area and when i added the coord to the player.java isinwild and then i compiled and restarted server. I still was unable to attack other playersâ€¦

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (absX >= 3090 && absX >= 3959 && absY >= 9098 && absY <=9132 || (coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 && [b]coordX <= 2505 && coordY <= 3874)[/b] { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) && (coordX >= 3090) && (coordY >= 3959) && [b](coordX <= 2505) && (coordY <= 3874)[/b] ) { return true; } }
Bold is the new coords. I also want the wild to be multi (not single) so you can team on people.

Thanks
